headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self' https:; script-src 'self' https:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src https://fonts.gstatic.com data:; img-src 'self' data: https:; connect-src 'self' https:; frame-ancestors 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self';
